reviewText: It was not very good and skipped around. I couldn't follow the story. Very confusing and very slow to make a point.

The movie was in Spanish or Portugese (a fact that was not mentioned in the write up) and we could not get subtitles. Many of the women looked alike, so several of the six scenarios seemed repetitious...and none of them went any place very interesting, though being able to understand the dialog would no doubt have helped.

There was no sexual tension in any of the Violetas and I'm sick of these movies with females attracted to females but with lousy kissing scenes and obviously badly staged love making.

So often these kinds of things are just horrible, but these weren't.  Couple of them were very enjoyable.  One was definitely male fantasy which is often the case.  These are more like film studies done by students.  But quality of recording, light, sound and acting were all better than average.  Overall enjoyable.

A good mix, long movie overall made up of series of shorts. **So sorry to the guys who thought there was not enough SEX in this film for them... try PORN.** This film is actually a cute set of foreign lesbian shorts; some well-written, with good to fair acting. Some skits quite hot! A few of them were so good they should've been made into an entire movie to finish the story!
great idea, but could have been done better. MORE sexual tension building to a more "sexually explicit" climax! also, please redo in english.

This film with its poor editing could have been better. The first scene could have been sexy, but it ended.  The other scenes could have been sexy but they were all chopped up and made no sense. It seemed like we were not to see much skin, just small talk.
FINALLY, a PG-13 lesbian movie !

a cute movie, convincing, interesting and realistic. It's done from a cultural point of view very different to the usual generic, boring Hollywood stuff. I love it

The description of the film is much better than the film  Be careful, don't get hooked by it and make the mistake of renting it.  The blurb writer was far better than the screen writers and I think there are six different stories, but I couldn't swear it. My attention was wandering more than... a blind rat. Not a good sign during a seduction scene. I kept waiting for the title: Sexual Tension & seduction.  I think it was mistranslated from  sexual frustration or stupidity.  The only person in the film who had, what appears, in the shadows, to be sex is a man. This is, perhaps, the classic aspect of lesbian film to which they refer,  but there wasn't even a seduction.
 No, I wasn't looking for pornography, but there's a lot of room to have fun between good sexual tension, seduction, and even sex. If you acknowledge the difference heed the warning.

 The first starts with two late teens, early 20's. One does plan to seduce. There is an offering of wine, come hither. That's it. Just as they kiss the screen goes black and the next thing the seductress is whimpering about not being a lesbian and this other woman had no right to abuse her. It doesn't appear either has removed even a sock in the interim,  the high point was the acknowledged lesbian putting on her shoes before she yells at the other. The next couple are older, I think may be they know what sexual tension and seduction are. Nope. Save yourself the time, the money, the irritation. One couple has moment of intimacy in mutual grooming, which isn't strictly a lesbian sport, or even human. They fantasize about kissing, but do they? I can't remember.  There is not a single good thing I can say about this.
It has all the makings of classic lesbian film, It's abysmal and if not counting the minutes for it to end, run screaming...

Interesting lesbian drama can be seen in foreign TV series like Lip Service or Feminin. Zip over to Prime TV.  Offer different things, realism, drama, adult women, seduction, tension and fun.
Nothing there.
